page.title: 12Health_S/Prior, Clearbrook.
page.content: If people in{Wotter,Lee Moor & Shaugh {Prior}are ill and need to see the Doctor, the nearest surgery is in { {Wotter.}The surgery is open on Monday and Friday from 9am to 1pm and on Wednesday from 1pm to 5pm. People in {Clearbrook }who need to visit the Doctor have to travel to {Yelverton.} These two surgeries cover a wide area and several hundred people. When people cannot travel to the Doctors they will come to the house to see patients. In an emergency an ambulance may have to travel ten miles to an injured person and transport them to hospital. The nearest accident unit is ten miles away at Freedom Fields in { {Plymouth.} They have a dispensing service at both surgeries, the nearest chemist being at least four miles away.
